body.p: If everything has been set up properly, you should be able to run the application. When you open http://bloggie.dev/, you should see the front page of your blog, listing the most recent posts. Clicking on a "more" link shows the post page. It is worth taking a moment to open the HTML source to view the rendered code.

You now have a very simple stage2 application. Armed with your understanding of the basics, you can now march onward and turn Bloggie into a full-featured blog engine. In the next few chapters, you will add administrative capabilities, including authentication and security layers, "pretty" URLs, comments and input validation, form handling, slots, nice templates and output types, and RSS feeds.
